response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe it could be an unparalleled addition to your collection or business. Given its worth to you, we propose a price of $1,350,000 to facilitate this transaction. We understand that negotiations are part of the process, so please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's room for discussion. We look forward to the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
